name: Pod (itch) (dutchlish)
description:
Pod

A short, first-person, underwater, surrealist,  puzzle-platform adventure set in a sea within a sea within a sea within a sea. 

Get to the next pool... Get to the next pool... Get to the next pool...

Made in 3 days for the Water Themed Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/water-themed-game-jam-february-2021 (only saw the jam three days before the deadline , hence the short development time). 

Headphones recommended.

A slight rush to get it finished, so I'm sure there are bugs I don't know about. If you come across a bug, please let me know in the comments so I can fix it after the jam! If you do get stuck, you can always press R to restart at the last checkpoint, or RMB to start the game over. 

Would love to hear your comments. 

(Known occasional issue: the very first key may not register the mouse click the first time to pick it up, in the unlikely event this happens just keep clicking and it will register). HINTS:  Click statues. You'll need to pick up speed to fly out of deeper pools.

Controls:

Movement - AWSD

Look - Mouse

Walk faster - Left Shift

Swim (underwater) - Tap Space

Interact - LMB

Restart Game - RMB

Restart Checkpoint- R

Credits: 

Game design & programming: 

Mike Bailey

Engine:

Unity
